answers.author: Alexandra Iannolo
answers.text:
Hello,
I forwarded your question to Evelina Moulder and she has compiled a list of comparable cities for you based on population, median income, and form of government. The list includes cities in the same region as Goodyear. You can use these as a starting point for comparing individual services.
Ali Iannolo
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern
aiannolo@ICMA.org

answers.author: Elaine Schmerbeck
answers.text:
Wow!  Thank you so much.  I have not been on this website in a few days so I did not see your reply.  May I correspond with you for further assistance with this comparison?

author: Elaine Schmerbeck
text: Goodyear, Arizona would like to develop a list of 5-10 comparable cities, not necessarily all in Arizona.  Population, square mileage, organization structure, services, etc. would be used as factors.  Census information provides demographics on the citizens, but not on the "City Hall" itself.  How do I get started?
title: Comparing to other cities
